overview:
pg40 Consulting Group is a management consulting services organization focusing on Business Consulting, Strategy Implementation, IT Mangement, Innovation and Technology.

pg40 Consulting Group was founded in 2008 with offices in Germany and the U.S. and delivers services in Europe and North America.

pg40 consultants deliver services to our clients in Manufacturing and Automotive, Pharmaceutical, Energy, Banking and Finance.

pg40 aim to tackle large scale challenges. Some challenges however seem to be too complex. Though pg40 is following a method for strategy implementation where persistence, large scale thinking, finding the rights individuals and the ability to break down the challenge in digestible tasks is their secret.

The company concept is similar to what Don Tapscott and Anthony D. Williams in “Wikinomics: How Mass Collaboration Changes Everything” defines as “Ideagoras”.

pg40’s consulting model is based on a holistic understanding of the client’s situation to derive the most suitable and beneficial solution to the client’s complex problems.

Through flexibility pg40 empowers all employees and partners to develop which unlocks unique creativity and generates innovation and true customer orientation.

pg40’s focus extends from conception to implementation to deliver the perfect solution for the client’s strategy to create sustainable change and achieve desired benefits.

pg40’s consulting model rests upon the lean principle and true collaboration, eliminating unnecessary overheads to create diversity, creativity and innovation.
